entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 26 March 2023
